text: ate jekara tusim inham tom pucho ki asamanam ate dharati nu kisa ne paida kita hai tam uha kahinage ki alaha ne. Akho, tuhada ki vicara hai? (Isa bare ki) alaha tom binham tusim jisa nu pukarade ho. Jekara alaha mainu ko'i dukha pahuca'una cahe tam ki iha mere dhukha nu dura kara sakade hana jam alaha mere ute ko'i kirapa karani cahe tam ki iha usa di kirapa nu roka sakade hana. Akhom, ki mere la'i alaha kafi hai. Bharosa karana vale use te bharosa karade hana
